identificationModule.briefTitle: Study of Sotorasib, Panitumumab and FOLFIRI Versus FOLFIRI With or Without Bevacizumab-awwb in Treatment-naïve Participants With Metastatic Colorectal Cancer With KRAS p.G12C Mutation
identificationModule.officialTitle: Phase 3 Multicenter, Randomized, Open-label, Active-controlled Study of Sotorasib, Panitumumab and FOLFIRI Versus FOLFIRI With or Without Bevacizumab-awwb for Treatment-naïve Subjects With Metastatic Colorectal Cancer With KRAS p.G12C Mutation (CodeBreaK 301)

descriptionModule.briefSummary: The aim of this study is to compare progression free survival (PFS) in treatment-naïve Participants with KRAS p.G12C mutated metastatic colorectal cancer (mCRC) receiving sotorasib, panitumumab and FOLFIRI vs FOLFIRI with or without bevacizumab-awwb.

armGroups.label: Arm A: Sotorasib + Panitumumab + FOLFIRI
armGroups.description: Sotorasib was taken daily (QD) as an oral tablet. Panitumumab and FOLFIRI were received every 2 weeks (Q2W) via intravenous infusion (IV).

armGroups.label: Arm B: FOLFIRI with or Without Bevacizumab-awwb
armGroups.description: Participants received FOLFIRI Q2W with or without bevacizumab-awwb.

interventions.name: FOLFIRI Regimen
interventions.description: Combination of irinotecan, leucovorin, and 5-fluorouracil given intravenously Q2W.
armGroupLabels: Arm B: FOLFIRI with or Without Bevacizumab-awwb

interventions.name: Sotorasib
interventions.description: Immediate-release solid dosage form administered PO.

interventions.name: Bevacizumab-awwb
armGroupLabels: Arm B: FOLFIRI with or Without Bevacizumab-awwb

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Pathologically documented metastatic colorectal adenocarcinoma with KRAS p.G12C mutation by a locally validated assay.
* Central confirmation of KRAS p.G12C mutation
* Measurable metastatic disease per RECIST v1.1 criteria.
* Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) Performance Status of ≤ 1.
* Adequate organ function.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Active, untreated brain metastases.
* Leptomeningeal disease
* Previous treatment with a KRAS p.G12C inhibitor
* History of interstitial pneumonitis or pulmonary fibrosis or evidence of interstitial pneumonitis or pulmonary fibrosis on baseline CT scan
